name: Snowpult
description:
The world has frozen over and the only way to change that is to catapult the snow at targets in the hope of thawing the world and bringing forth the summer.
Created for the Epic Games Springjam 2020
Mouse and Gamepad are both supported.

Modifier catagory: Army of One

Assets used:
Rocks and textures from Modular Cliffs
Trees from Nature package
Snow textures from Textures.com

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Construct_Games
Marketplace store: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/profile/Construct+Games
